_source: Microsoft Learn - ICE Reference, WiX Documentation, Best Practices

ice_rules.description: Simple validation test to verify ICE mechanism is working correctly.
Circular reference test for files. Detects when a file references itself through the File table.
Basic data type validation. Ensures all columns have correct data types and values within valid ranges.
Sequence number validation. Actions must have sequence numbers 1-32767, with standard actions in proper ranges.
Class table validation. Validates Context column and CLSID uniqueness per component.
Column definition validation. All columns must match their _Validation table definitions.
Font installation validation. Fonts must be installed to the FontsFolder directory.
Component KeyPath validation. KeyPath must reference a valid File or Registry entry.
System directory validation. Certain directories cannot be the target of Directory table entries.
AdvtExecuteSequence validation. Advertise sequence must not have UI actions.
Dialog control validation. Controls must not extend beyond dialog boundaries.
Custom action type validation. Type column must contain valid custom action type.
Dialog control validation. Certain control types require specific attributes.
Feature parent validation. Feature parent references must be valid and non-circular.
MIME/Extension validation. MIME entries must have corresponding Extension entries.
ProductCode validation. ProductCode property must be a valid GUID.
Control type validation. PushButton controls must reference valid published events.
KeyPath is directory validation. Component with directory KeyPath must have CreateFolder entry.
AdvtExecuteSequence validation. Advertise sequence references must be valid.
Dialog required controls. All required dialog controls must be present.
Component validation. Each component must have a unique component code GUID.
Feature/Component validation. FeatureComponents entries must reference valid features and components.
Tab order validation. Dialog tab order must be sequential without gaps.
Property validation. Property names must not conflict with reserved properties.
Merge module dependency validation. Required merge modules must be present.
Required standard actions. Essential actions must be present in sequences.
Sequence table organization. Actions must be properly ordered in sequences.
ForceReboot action validation. ForceReboot must be properly sequenced.
Stream name validation. Stream names must not exceed 62 characters.
File uniqueness validation. Same file must not appear in multiple components.
Control text validation. Text must not exceed control boundaries.
Foreign key validation. All foreign key references must be valid.
Registry key validation. Registry entries must have valid keys.
Radio button validation. Radio button groups must have valid entries.
Cabinet file validation. Cabinet file references must be valid.
Icon table validation. Icons must be properly formatted ICO files.
Component with registry only. Components with only registry should use registry KeyPath.
Component user profile validation. Components in user profile must use HKCU KeyPath.
Summary Information validation. Summary Information stream must be valid.
Feature misconfiguration. Features should have proper default install state.
Extension without ProgId. Extension entries should have corresponding ProgId.
Class InprocServer validation. InprocServer entries must reference valid files.
Non-sequenced standard action. Required standard actions must be in sequences.
Dialog control attribute validation. Controls should have appropriate attributes.
Reserved bit validation. Reserved bits in column values must be zero.
Custom property validation. Custom properties should follow naming conventions.
Feature parent validation. Feature parent must exist and not create circular reference.
Directory parent validation. Directory entries should have valid parent references.
Non-REG_SZ default value. Default registry values should typically be REG_SZ.
Icon/Shortcut validation. Advertised shortcuts must have valid icons.
TTC font validation. TrueType Collection fonts need special handling.
AppSearch property validation. Properties set by AppSearch should be public.
Registry entry per component. Large numbers of registry entries per component.
Companion file validation. Companion files must reference valid parent files.
LockPermissions validation. LockPermissions must reference valid objects.
Directory table validation. Directory paths should not be overly deep.
Component per-user/per-machine. Components must not mix per-user and per-machine resources.
Media table validation. Media entries must have valid cabinet references.
Advertised shortcut validation. Advertised shortcuts need specific configurations.
File table validation. File entries must have valid sequence numbers.
Upgrade table validation. Upgrade entries should have valid version ranges.
IsolatedComponent validation. Isolated components must have proper configuration.
RemoveFile table validation. RemoveFile entries should target valid directories.
Directory removal validation. Directories set for removal must exist.
Environment variable validation. Environment entries should have valid configurations.
Sequence table validation. Schema version compatibility checks.
Target directory validation. Target directories must be properly defined.
Global assembly validation. Global assemblies must be properly configured.
TypeLib validation. TypeLib entries must reference valid files.
Integer property validation. Integer properties should have integer values.
MIME content type validation. MIME entries must have valid content types.
Custom action data validation. Custom action data length recommendations.
Package code validation. Package code must be a valid GUID and should be auto-generated.
FASTOEM property validation. FASTOEM installations have specific requirements.
Reserved file names. Files should not use Windows reserved names.
Directory names validation. Directory names should not use reserved names.
OLE registration. OLE registration entries should have proper format.
AdvtUISequence validation. AdvtUISequence should not contain certain actions.
Component GUID reference. Component references must use valid GUIDs.
Template Summary validation. Template Summary must have valid format.
Action condition validation. Conditions on standard actions should be valid.
InstallExecuteSequence validation. Proper action sequencing required.
MsiAssembly validation. Assembly entries must have proper configuration.
MUI validation. MUI installations require specific configurations.
MsiLockPermissionsEx validation. New-style permissions must be properly formatted.
Package property validation. Certain properties have specific requirements.
Author Summary validation. Author field should be populated.
Comments Summary validation. Comments field should be populated.
ProgId validation. ProgId entries should have proper format.
Shortcut directory validation. Shortcuts must target valid directories.
File hash validation. File entries should have hash data for verification.
Permanent component GUID. Permanent components require stable GUIDs.
Custom action async. Async custom actions have specific requirements.
Global assembly cache. GAC assemblies require specific configurations.
Control condition validation. BBControl conditions should be valid.
PublishComponent validation. Published components should be properly configured.
Multiple feature parent. Components should not be in features from different branches.
ModuleSubstitution validation. Module substitution formatting must be correct.
Directory table parent validation. All parent references must resolve.
CreateFolder validation. CreateFolder entries should reference valid directories.
Isolated component shared DLL. IsolatedComponent validation for shared DLLs.
Assembly identity validation. Assemblies must have consistent identity.
Nested install validation. Nested installs require special handling.
System folder component. Components installing to system folders need attention.
SelfReg validation. Self-registering modules should use proper sequencing.
Merge module component validation. Validates component GUIDs in merge modules.
Merge module feature validation. Validates merge module feature definitions.
Merge module sequence validation. Validates sequence entries.
Merge module property validation. Validates property definitions.
Merge module required tables. Validates required merge module tables.
Merge module exclusion validation. Validates module exclusions.
Merge module directory validation. Validates directory entries.
Merge module dependency validation. Validates module dependencies.
Merge module configuration validation. Validates module configurations.
Merge module substitution validation. Validates text substitutions.
Merge module component location. Components must be in single directory.
Merge module ignore tables. ModuleIgnoreTable validation.
Merge module CAB files. Cabinet file organization in merge modules.
Merge module condition validation. Conditional statements in merge modules.
Merge module media sequencing. Media sequence numbers in merge modules.
WiX linker internal error. An unexpected error occurred during linking.
Multiple entry sections found. Only one entry section allowed per output.
Missing entry section. An entry section (Product, Module, etc.) is required.
Symbol redefinition. A symbol is defined multiple times with different values.
Unresolved reference to symbol. A referenced symbol could not be found.
Section not referenced. A section exists but is not referenced by any other section.
Invalid ICE executable. The specified ICE DLL or executable is invalid.
ICE validation failed. An ICE validation check failed.
Circular reference in merge module. Merge modules have circular dependencies.
Missing source file. A source file referenced by the linker could not be found.
Merge module contains duplicate rows. A merge module adds duplicate table rows.
Invalid output type. The specified output type is not valid.
Invalid file ID. A file identifier is invalid or too long.
Cab file extraction failed. Could not extract files from cabinet.
Invalid fragment reference. Fragment reference could not be resolved.
Unused binding path. A binding path was specified but not used.
Invalid media layout. Media layout specification is invalid.
Merge conflict. Merge module conflicts with existing data.
Deprecated linker feature. A deprecated linker feature is being used.
Invalid cabinet compression. Cabinet compression settings are invalid.
WiX linker validation. General linker error.
Unresolved reference. A reference could not be resolved.
Duplicate symbol. The same symbol is defined multiple times.
Missing file. A referenced file could not be found.
Unused section. A section is defined but not referenced.
Invalid database schema. Database schema validation failed.
Deprecated feature. A deprecated WiX feature is being used.
Conflicting file versions. Multiple files with same name but different versions.
Long file name truncation. File name was truncated for 8.3 compatibility.
Invalid GUID format. A GUID is not in valid format.
Missing required property. A required property is not defined.
WiX compiler internal error. An unexpected error occurred during compilation.
Invalid XML. The source file contains invalid XML.
Schema validation failure. XML does not conform to WiX schema.
Unexpected element. An element is not valid in this context.
Unexpected attribute. An attribute is not valid for this element.
Missing required attribute. A required attribute is missing.
Invalid attribute value. The attribute value is not valid.
Deprecated element. This element is deprecated and will be removed.
Deprecated attribute. This attribute is deprecated and will be removed.
Duplicate identifier. The same identifier is used multiple times.
Invalid GUID. The GUID format is invalid.
Invalid identifier. The identifier format is invalid.
Invalid version. The version format is invalid.
Invalid path. The path format is invalid.
Circular reference. A circular reference was detected.
Missing reference target. Referenced element not found.
Empty element. Element has no content or children.
Invalid preprocessor directive. Preprocessor directive syntax is invalid.
Undefined variable. A preprocessor variable is not defined.
Invalid condition. The condition syntax is invalid.
WiX compiler validation. General compiler error.
Invalid attribute. An attribute has an invalid value.
Missing required attribute. A required attribute is not specified.
Invalid element. An element is used incorrectly.
Deprecated element. An element is deprecated.
Invalid child element. A child element is not valid in context.
Preprocessor error. A preprocessor directive failed.
Invalid namespace. The XML namespace is invalid.
Extension not found. A referenced extension is not loaded.
Possible typo in attribute value. Value looks like common typo.
Conflicting attributes. Attributes cannot be used together.
Smoke test failure. General smoke test warning.
Validation suite incomplete. Some validation tests skipped.
Custom action with error return. Custom action may return error.
Missing CAB file. Referenced cabinet file not found.
Long file name. File name exceeds recommended length.
Validation warning. General validation warning.
Component condition. Component condition may affect installation.
Large package size. Package exceeds recommended size.
Many components. Package has large number of components.
Deep directory structure. Directory nesting exceeds recommendation.
Many features. Package has many features which may confuse users.
Missing localization. Some strings are not localized.
Invalid attribute value. An attribute has an invalid value.
Duplicate ID. The same ID is used multiple times.
Invalid reference. A reference points to a non-existent element.
Missing required child. A required child element is missing.
Invalid parent element. Element cannot be child of this parent.
Deprecated syntax. This syntax is deprecated.
Invalid GUID format. GUID must be in standard format.
Invalid version format. Version must be in X.X.X.X format.
File not found. Source file does not exist.
Unused variable. A variable is defined but never used.
WiX build validation. Required build configuration missing.
WiX extension warning. Extension validation warning.
WiX schema error. WiX source does not match schema.
WiX best practice. WiX best practice recommendation.
WiX reference error. A WiX reference could not be resolved.
Invalid extension. Referenced extension is not valid.
Extension version mismatch. Extension version differs from WiX version.
Missing extension reference. Extension element used without reference.
Unused extension. An extension is referenced but not used.
Invalid localization. Localization file format is invalid.
Database validation error. General database validation error.
Unsigned package. Package is not digitally signed.
Missing summary info. Summary information stream incomplete.
Property case. Public property not uppercase.
Custom action security. Elevated custom action review needed.
Invalid table data. Table data does not match schema.
Empty table. Table exists but has no rows.
Foreign key violation. Foreign key reference is invalid.
Nullable column violation. Non-nullable column contains null.
Primary key violation. Primary key constraint violated.
Column size exceeded. Data exceeds column size limit.
Invalid column type. Column data type mismatch.
Orphaned row. Table row is not referenced by any other table.
Required table missing. A required table is not present.
Duplicate row data. Table contains duplicate rows.
Invalid authoring. Fundamental authoring error detected.
Authoring recommendation. Authoring practice could be improved.
Invalid row reference. Row reference cannot be resolved.
Conditional authoring. Authoring depends on condition.
Missing required row. A required table row is missing.
Bundle validation error. Bundle configuration is invalid.
Bundle package warning. Package in bundle has issues.
Bundle chain error. Chain configuration is invalid.
Bundle variable warning. Variable configuration warning.
Bundle payload error. Payload could not be processed.
Bundle validation error. Bundle configuration is invalid.
Bundle package warning. Package in bundle has issues.
Bundle chain error. Chain configuration is invalid.
Bundle variable warning. Variable configuration warning.
Bundle payload error. Payload could not be processed.
Invalid BA reference. Bootstrapper application reference is invalid.
Package detection. Package detection may be unreliable.
Invalid package reference. Referenced package not found.
Circular package dependency. Packages have circular dependencies.
Missing package payload. Package payload file not found.
Unsigned package in bundle. Package in bundle is not signed.
Invalid condition. Bundle condition syntax is invalid.
Variable type mismatch. Variable used with incompatible type.
Invalid download URL. Package download URL is invalid.
Missing exit code mapping. Exit code may not be handled correctly.
Extension compatibility. Extension may have compatibility issues.
Extension configuration. Extension configuration is invalid.
Extension version. Extension version may not be compatible.
Extension not found. Referenced extension could not be loaded.
Extension deprecated. Extension feature is deprecated.
IIS extension validation. IIS configuration review needed.
Invalid web site. Web site configuration is invalid.
Invalid app pool. Application pool configuration is invalid.
Missing IIS feature. Required IIS feature may not be installed.
Invalid virtual directory. Virtual directory path is invalid.
IIS version compatibility. Configuration may not work on all IIS versions.
Invalid certificate reference. SSL certificate reference is invalid.
App pool identity. App pool identity configuration review needed.
Invalid binding. Web site binding configuration is invalid.
Missing handler mapping. Handler mapping may be required.
SQL extension validation. SQL configuration review needed.
Invalid database connection. Database connection string is invalid.
Invalid SQL script. SQL script syntax is invalid.
SQL execution order. Script execution order may need review.
Missing SQL script. Referenced SQL script file not found.
SQL rollback script. Rollback script recommended.
SQL authentication. SQL authentication method review needed.
Invalid database name. Database name format is invalid.
SQL Server version. SQL may not work on all SQL Server versions.
SQL transaction scope. Transaction scope may need review.
Util extension validation. Util configuration review needed.
Invalid user configuration. User account configuration is invalid.
Invalid group configuration. Group configuration is invalid.
Permission configuration. Permission settings review needed.
Invalid XML configuration. XML file configuration is invalid.
Service configuration. Service config settings review needed.
Invalid file share. File share configuration is invalid.
Close application. CloseApplication settings review needed.
Invalid internet shortcut. Internet shortcut configuration is invalid.
Event source. Event source registration review needed.
NetFx extension validation. .NET configuration review needed.
Invalid .NET version. .NET version specification is invalid.
.NET framework detection. Framework detection may be unreliable.
Invalid NativeImage. NativeImage configuration is invalid.
.NET Core compatibility. .NET Core configuration review needed.
Missing .NET prerequisite. Required .NET version not available.
Assembly strong name. Assembly strong name validation.
GAC registration. GAC registration may fail on some systems.
Invalid assembly reference. Assembly reference could not be resolved.
.NET version compatibility. Application may not run on target .NET version.
BAL extension validation. Bootstrapper application review needed.
Invalid BA theme. Bootstrapper application theme is invalid.
BA localization. Bootstrapper localization review needed.
Missing BA resource. Bootstrapper resource file not found.
BA license file. License file configuration review needed.
Invalid BA configuration. BA configuration is invalid.
BA prerequisite. Prerequisite package configuration review.
BA DLL not found. Bootstrapper application DLL not found.
BA overridable variable. Variable override configuration review.
BA condition. Bootstrapper condition review needed.
HTTP extension validation. HTTP configuration review needed.
Invalid URL reservation. URL reservation configuration is invalid.
Invalid SSL certificate. SSL certificate configuration is invalid.
URL ACL. URL access control review needed.
Invalid HTTP binding. HTTP binding configuration is invalid.
Firewall extension validation. Firewall rule review needed.
Invalid firewall rule. Firewall rule configuration is invalid.
Firewall scope. Firewall rule scope may be too broad.
Firewall profile. Firewall profile configuration review needed.
Invalid remote address. Remote address specification is invalid.
MSMQ extension validation. Message queue review needed.
Invalid queue path. Message queue path is invalid.
Queue permissions. Queue permission configuration review.
PowerShell extension validation. PowerShell configuration review.
Invalid snap-in. PowerShell snap-in configuration is invalid.
PowerShell version. PowerShell version compatibility review.
Visual Studio extension validation. VS configuration review.
Invalid VSIX package. VSIX package configuration is invalid.
VS version detection. Visual Studio version detection review.
COM+ extension validation. COM+ configuration review needed.
Invalid COM+ application. COM+ application configuration is invalid.
COM+ security. COM+ security configuration review.
Invalid COM+ component. COM+ component registration is invalid.
COM+ partition. COM+ partition configuration review.
Dependency extension validation. Dependency configuration review.
Invalid dependency provider. Dependency provider configuration is invalid.
Missing dependency. A required dependency may not be installed.
DirectX extension validation. DirectX configuration review.
Invalid DirectX check. DirectX check configuration is invalid.
Tag extension validation. Software tag configuration review.
Invalid software tag. Software tag configuration is invalid.
